sentence.Network_en: Alexander is a man of unquestioned moral rectitude.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚历山大是个品行端正无瑕的人.

sentence.Network_en: I am sure she is a paragon of rectitude.
sentence.Network_cn: 我可以肯定她是个正直的完人.

sentence.Network_en: She was indignant with his presumption and self - satisfaction and conscious rectitude.
sentence.Network_cn: 她恼火他的傲慢自满和自以为是.

千白_百度百科 ... 17.quintessence 典范 18.rectitude 正值，诚实 19.sword 剑.

list.abs: Confucius taught that moral rectitude is far more important than eloquence ., 孔夫子教导 , 品性端正远比雄辩的口才重要.
on the other hand , the benefits of rectitude can be striking .另一方面，品行端正的益处会很显著。
以及社会品德（ social rectitude ） 的观念与指标来衡量企业的社会责任 。 多纳伍德不公正> 公正清廉不公正> 公正笔直不公正> 公正
a set mask of rectitude or an ., 一套正直的面具或一个.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting straightness): from Old French, from late Latin rectitudo, from Latin rectus 'right, straight'

entry.def: Rectitude is a quality or attitude that is shown by people who behave honestly and morally according to accepted standards.

means.word_mean: 1. uprightness as a consequence of being honorable and honest

auth_sentence.content: So you end up convinced of your own rectitude.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: So you end up convinced of your own rectitude.

auth_sentence.content: There does need to be more fiscal rectitude.

stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+direct直接的→adj.间接的, 迂回的
di离开+rect正,直→直接离开→径直的→指向，针对→管理，指导
direct直接的+ly表副词→adv.直接地, 立即
correct[v.改正,纠正]+itude状态→纠正后的状态
correct[v.改正,纠正]+ive表名词→n.矫正物, 中和物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 方向, 指导, 趋势
stems_affixes.word_buile: direct直接的;指导;指向+ion动作或状态→n.方向, 指导, 趋势

stems_affixes.value_cn: 主任, 主管, 导演

rect正,直+angle角→[四个角]都是直角→矩形
rect正,直+itude状态→正直的状态→诚实,正直
di离开+rect正,直→直接离开→径直的→指向，针对→管理，指导
rect正,直+ify……化→使……正直→改正[错误]
